title: Do you, Riot, not accept visa gift cards?
body:
Hi, Riot! Sorry if I post this in the boards or something but I just didn't think it was horribly important enough to put somewhere else, so I hope it is in the right place.

So, I got a visa gift card to spend where I want and I wanted to buy skins and stuff buuuuuuuuut I see that your payment options don't include visa gift cards. Which is strange since you accept Subway gift cards. So I just wanted to know why you guys don't have Visa gift cards as a payment option since they are fairly common and not having it as an option forces some people to take their money elsewhere? Or am I just looking in the wrong place or doing something wrong? Please let me know! Thanks.

replies.body:
We do accept visa gift cards! You'll need to input that card info just like a normal credit or debit card though. It can be a little confusing since the options don't specifically say visa gift cards. Also keep in mind that you _may_ need to activate the gift card online before you'll be able to use it! 

You can always check up on the different payment options [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590-What-payment-methods-are-available-to-me-) as well.
Thanks! But what about the "cardholder" and the "Zip Code" ones, since this was bought for me? What do I put in there?

Just put in your own personal information
If possible, put the zip code of where the card was bought, but if you dont know, your normal zip code should work.
Did you ever get this sorted out? How did it go down? What did support do to aid you?
Oh I didn't register the card before buying. That was the problem.

Ok this may or may not be a different problem but when I try to do it, this message pops up:

ERROR
Your payment attempt has been declined by your card provider. Please contact your provider for more information.


So what's going on?

It'd be best for our billing specialists to look into this error since they have much more knowledge about these payment methods. Reach out to our support agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to help you out soon!

Just select the option like its a normal visa card
Unless it's a mastercard, in which case select mastercard.
